header.title: Drops
header.subtext: Sophisticated products in low MOQs for immediate delivery

blocks.title: Speed up the supply-chain
blocks.content:
Our Drop are collections of ready-to-ship styles. This unique concept provides you with more freedom:

* Order high quality products in low MOQs (as from 10 pieces)
* Receive delivery within a week

blocks.title: Make informed decisions
blocks.content:
You aren't bound by scale or time:

* Buy closer to season
* Reduce inventory & markdow risk
* Replenish your best-sellers instantly

blocks.title: Restore Value
blocks.content:
Every year we lose $120 billion worth of economic and environmental capital in the form of surplus stock going to landfill. 

To reduce their environmental footprint, many of our Drops are made with high-end surplus yarns & fabrics.

We partner with factories to restore value & reduce waste
